com.inrix.sdk

Class IncidentUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.inrix.sdk.IncidentUtils

  • public class IncidentUtils
extends Object
    Contains static methods that are useful in managing incidents.

      • IncidentUtils

    • Method Detail

      • isRoadClosure

        public static boolean isRoadClosure(Integer eventCode)
        Returns whether an event code is a road closure, per ISO 14819-1:2003.
        Parameters:
        eventCode - The event code.
        Returns:
        true if the event code is a road closure; otherwise, false.

      • getDefaultComparator

        public static Comparator<Incident> getDefaultComparator()
        Gets the default incidents comparator for sorting for alerts. This comparator gives priority to most important incidents first, then prioritizes them by distance.
        Returns:
        The default comparator for alerts.

      • getAngleComparator

        public static Comparator<Incident> getAngleComparator(float currentHeading,
                                      Location currentLocation)
        Gets the angle based incidents comparator for sorting for alerts. This comparator gives priority to most important and most probable happened on the road ahead of user incidents first, then prioritizes them by distance.
        Returns:
        The default comparator for alerts.

      • getDefaultListComparator

        public static Comparator<Incident> getDefaultListComparator()
        Get default incidents comparator for sorting for displaying incidents in a list. This comparator prioritizes them by distance first, then gives priority to most important incidents.
        Returns:
        The default comparator for displaying in a list.

      • getDefaultFilter

        public static IFilter<Incident> getDefaultFilter()
        Gets the default filter. This filter excludes Incident.IncidentType.CONSTRUCTION and Incident.IncidentType.UNKNOWN incidents.
        Returns:
        The default filter.

      • getLookAheadUnitDistance

        public static double getLookAheadUnitDistance(float speedFactor,
                              Location currentLocation,
                              int minDistance,
                              int maxDistance)
        Get the distance we need to look ahead based on the speed factor and current speed.
        Returns:
        distance to look ahead in km`s / miles.

      • getLookAheadPreferedDistance

        public static double getLookAheadPreferedDistance(float speedFactor,
                                  Location currentLocation,
                                  int minDistance,
                                  int maxDistance)
        Get the distance we need to look ahead based on the speed factor and current speed.
        Returns:
        distance to look ahead in meters / miles.

      • getLookAheadDistance

        public static double getLookAheadDistance(float speedFactor,
                          Location currentLocation,
                          int minDistance,
                          int maxDistance)
        Get the distance we need to look ahead based on the speed factor and current speed.
        Returns:
        distance to look ahead in meters.

      • getIncidentTypeFilter

        public static IFilter<Incident> getIncidentTypeFilter(@NonNull
                                      Set<Incident.IncidentType> incidentTypesAllowed)
        Get a custom filter which can selectively allow incidents.
        Parameters:
        incidentTypesAllowed - A set of Incident.IncidentTypes that should return true when IFilter.isItemAllowed(T) is called.
        Returns:
        A custom Incident filter.

      • getFilterAngle

        public static <T extends Bearing> double getFilterAngle(T incident,
                                        float currentHeading,
                                        Location currentLocation)

      • getAngleFilter

        public static <T extends Bearing> IFilter<T> getAngleFilter(@NonNull
                                            Location currentLocation,
                                            @NonNull
                                            float currentHeading,
                                            @NonNull
                                            float forwardConeAngle)

      • applyFilters

        @NonNull
public static <T> List<T> applyFilters(List<T> items,
                               IFilter<T>... filters)
        Filter the list with the user provided filter.
        Type Parameters:
        T - Target list element type.
        Parameters:
        items - The list of items that needs to be filtered.
        filters - The filters to apply to the list.
        Returns:
        The filtered list.
